data.name: Max_Slides.Help
data.value: The maximum slides to be displayed in this gallery

data.name: PauseTime.Help
data.value: Turn on auto play to auto move to next slide every few seconds

data.name: Transition.Help
data.value: The type of Transition effect while changing slides.

data.name: TransitionSpeed.Help
data.value: The time taken to complete image transition. The value in milliseconds.

data.name: ImageResize.Help
data.value: In case the images are smaller or bigger than the banner dimension, the banner will try to resize the images to Fit(to show full image) or Fill(resize in such a way to avoid white space) the available area.

data.name: AlignCenter.Help
data.value: If the image dimension is not matching the banner's dimension, enabling this option will align the image into center (both vertically and horizontally). If disabled, it will align the image to top-left.

data.name: ButtonSize.Help
data.value: Width and Height of all the Buttons in pixels.

data.name: Margin.Help
data.value: The Space between button and bottom-right edge of the banner in pixels.

data.name: Space.Help
data.value: The Spacing between each button in pixels.

data.name: Opacity.Help
data.value: All the buttons are slightly transparent before mouse over or selected. Change this value to set the transparency for normal state.

data.name: FloatMode.Help
data.value: The default caption will always align to bottom of the banner. To make the caption to freely position over the image, set this value to true.

data.name: AllowSelection.Help
data.value: Caption text selection is disabled by default for easier swipe navigation on both mobile and desktop. Allowing selection makes it undraggable on desktop browsers.

data.name: Blur.Help
data.value: The caption background's blur amount. To remove the blur effect, set the value 0.

data.name: CaptionMargin.Help
data.value: The space between Caption background box and 4 directions of the banner.

data.name: Padding.Help
data.value: The space between Caption background box and Caption text.

data.name: CaptionBgColor.Help
data.value: Addition to the Blur background, it is possible to super-impose a color layer to the caption box. Set the color value here.

data.name: CaptionBgOpacity.Help
data.value: Addition to the Blur background, it is possible to super-impose a color layer to the caption box. Set the transparency value for the color layer here.

data.name: Radius.Help
data.value: Corner Radius of caption background box.

data.name: Shadow.Help
data.value: Shadow behind the caption box. To remove teh shadow, set 0.

data.name: Border.Help
data.value: Border size of the caption background box in pixels. Set 0 to remove border.

data.name: IndividualSettings.Help
data.value:
Addition to the plugin parameters, use this option to customise individual slides with its own look and feel.

Each line represent a slide in your gallery, use commas to separate 6 attributes in each line.

For example, if you enter 5,200,120,100,20,#00ff00 in the 1st line, the 1st slide in your gallery will have these attributes:
delay time:5 seconds
caption width:200
caption height:120
caption position x:100
caption position y:20
caption bg color:#00ff00
